Package com.cs1530.group4.addendum.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UserService
    The Interface UserService describes the RPC methods that the server will implement.
    UserServiceAsync
    The Interface UserService describes the RPC methods that the server will implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddNewCourse
    This represents a UI to add new classes to a queue for the site administrator to approve
    AdminPanel
    This represents the UI for the application's administration page.
    ClassSearch
    This represents a UI to search for and add new classes to a User's courseList
    CommentBox
    A class representing the UI for a user to compose and edit comments
    CommentMenuPopup
    This class represents a popup menu that contains actions to be performed on a comment
    FlagForm
    A dialog that gives the user a UI to flag a post or comment for an administrator's review
    Login
    This represents the UI for the user to login.
    MainView
    This is the EntryPoint for the application.
    MenuPopup
    This represents the UI for actions to be done on a UserPost
    NewPasswordDialog
    This represents the UI for a user to change their password
    NewPost
    The Class NewPost represents a dialog for the user to create a new post with.
    NewUserDialog
    This represents a dialog for the creation of a new user account.
    PostComment
    This represents the UI for a comment that is associated with a UserPost's Post
    ProfilePictureUpload
    This represents a dialog box allowing a user to select an image file to use as their profile picture.
    PromptedTextBox
    This extends GWT's default TextBox to hint text when not focused
    ResetPasswordDialog
    This gives the user a UI to reset their password.
    RichTextToolbar
    The Class RichTextToolbar taken from https://code.google.com/p/richtexttoolbar/source/browse/trunk/src/net/elitecoderz/blog/RichTextToolbar.java
    Stream
    The Stream class is the main view for the users of Addendum.
    UserPost
    UserPost visually represents a post by a user of Addendum.
    UserService.Util
    Utility class for simplifying access to the instance of async service.
